name: Jotun
description: The Jotun is a gargantuan giant characterized by its impressive stature and possesses icy weapon attacks that deal extra cold damage.
memorable: Notably, the Jotun has magic resistance, unique abilities like Icy Weapons and Demigod’s Vitality, and can instill fear in nearby enemies.
goals: The Jotun typically seeks dominance in battle and can use its magical abilities for strategic advantages.
relations: Frequently encountered with other giants and creatures of cold environments.
environment: Usually found in icy terrains or mountainous regions.
strengths: High damage output, formidable hit points, and resistance to magical effects.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to faster opponents.
attacks: Utilizes powerful melee attacks with its Greatclub and ranged Rock attacks, both enhanced with icy cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Icy Sweep allows it to deal massive area damage and control the battlefield.
senses: Possesses darkvision out to 120 feet and passive Perception of 15, providing good awareness in dimly lit environments.
skills: Proficient in Arcana, History, and Nature, reflecting above-average knowledge.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Icy Weapons ability adds extra cold damage to all weapon attacks.
Material Bound ability makes it immune to effects that would move it from the Material Plane.
Frightful Presence ability can potentially frighten multiple enemies.
Rock Catching ability shows unexpected agility despite low Dexterity.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like earthquake and speak with animals at will, along with other useful spells three times per day.
